company.title: About Us
company.description1: We are a family business, located in Elche (Alicante), dedicated to passenger transport since the 1940s. Our knowledge of the sector, quality of service and preferential treatment of customers are your guarantee of travel.
company.description2: We are specialized in the sector, both in national and international travel. We have highly qualified staff and our vehicles are equipped with the most modern technologies, as well as all legally required safety systems, to ensure you travel with maximum comfort and confidence.
company.description3: We are committed to providing you with our services with the highest possible quality, as proof of this, we have four quality certificates, which is possible thanks to the commitment and efficiency of all the workers in our company.

policy.title: Company Mission and Commitment Statement
policy.subtitle: The organization, through its Manager, has identified the following principles and commitments:
policy.description: Autocares MISOL S.L. is an organization dedicated to discretionary passenger transport by road, both nationally and internationally.
commitments: Provide the client and society with a transport service in accordance with the client's requirements and compliance with current regulations in the places where the service is provided.
Offer a fleet of modern coaches in perfect maintenance condition.

Ensure passenger safety within a framework of comfort and excellent personal treatment, for which objectives are established to control and mitigate transport-related risks that may affect its workers and third parties, maintaining superior performance expressed in zero fatalities and zero serious injuries in traffic accidents.

Maintain an excellent corporate image through the clothing, personal appearance and professionalism of staff in contact with the client, as well as the cleanliness and functionality of the coach and its implicit complements.
Comply with punctuality, regularity and other requirements agreed with the service contractor.
Take care of material goods owned by the client that are deposited in our coaches.
Maintain a mutually beneficial collaboration with our suppliers and contractors.
Foster internal communication to involve professionals in commitments to continuous improvement in quality and environmental management.
Comply with all applicable legal requirements, as well as regulations on working hours and rest of its workers
Identify existing risks on the roads used, reporting them to the responsible authority.
Train drivers in responsible and safe driving conditions.

Participate in environmental protection by minimizing significant adverse environmental impacts generated by our activity, through prevention, continuous improvement and the establishment and review of environmental objectives and goals in our organizational system
Apply continuously and sustainably an integrated quality and environmental management system in accordance with ISO 9001, 14001, 13816 and 39001 standards in force.
policy.footer: AUTOCARES MI SOL S.L. will respect the quality commitments identified in its Service Charter, within the services included in the scope of implementation of the UNE-EN 13816:2003 standard.
